May 9, 1903 D Sunderland Contest
Sunderland Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
sunderland-contest
None
Roker Park, Sunderland The prize for the three winning bands was to provide the music during the evenings in the approaching summer.
The Sunderland Amalgamated Musicians' Union would provide music in the afternoons.
